Text:
As usual the quality is great but unfortunately it's playable only on pc's ,there must have been sth wrong with the encoding u did !
i dont know if it's the video or audio but it doesn't play at all on my tv lg le5500 or samsung c8000 3d via usb neither on samsung's c6900 3d bd player!

@superkas643

Get a WD TV Live Media Player. It plays almost anything.

It's most likely your TV. I have a 60" Sony Bravia and this MF will not display any PAL encoded dvd's which I suspect this release is. Check the FPS, most NTSC disks are 29+ FPS.
Just a guess why it won't play.
